title: [██████████.gnip.com] .htpasswd disclosure
content:
Greetings,
There is a .htpasswd disclosure on your subdomain :
Go to : http://█████████.gnip.com/.htpasswd
previewgnip:██████
{F173925}
Fix :
Protect the htpasswd file
steps: Observe the exposed .htpasswd file containing credentials
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the disclosure of a .htpasswd file on a subdomain, which contains sensitive authentication credentials. This file is typically used to store usernames and passwords for basic authentication on web servers. Exposure of this file can lead to unauthorized access to protected resources.
reason: The discovery of this vulnerability is straightforward as it only requires accessing a specific URL where the .htpasswd file is exposed. There are no complex interactions or multiple components involved in the attack.
